abstract: The second outing of this year’s edition of “American Idol” fell a steep 27 percent in the ratings from its performance on the same night last year — and 44 percent from its number two years ago.
snippet: The second outing of this year’s edition of “American Idol” fell a steep 27 percent in the ratings from its performance on the same night last year — and 44 percent from its number two years ago.
lead_paragraph: 5:11 p.m. | Updated “American Idol” may have officially crossed over from phenomenon to mere hit television show on Thursday, as the second outing of this year’s edition fell a steep 27 percent in the ratings from its performance on the same night last year – and 44 percent from its number two years ago.

headline.main: A Steep Drop in Ratings for ‘American Idol’
